full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL DUR KHROD BDAG PO'I GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL DANG KHRAG ZOR 'PHEN DUS CHOM RKUN CHINGS MDZAD MTHU LDAN ZHAGS PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
